CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Setup you password - you need to create master key only once';
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL WorkspaceIdentity
WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity';
GO
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [sj_external_par] WITH (
    LOCATION = N'abfss://fssynapseacc@stgsynapseacc.dfs.core.windows.net',
    CREDENTIAL = WorkspaceIdentity
);

create view sj_view as 
SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'product.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE= 'sj_external_par'
    ) AS [result]

--select prop_0 from sj_view


CREATE USER [pbi1@mngenv544380.onmicrosoft.com] FROM EXTERNAL PROVIDER;
CREATE LOGIN [pbi1@mngenv544380.onmicrosoft.com] from external PROVIDER
-- Grant permission to use scope credential 
GRANT REFERENCES ON DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL::WorkspaceIdentity TO [pbi1@mngenv544380.onmicrosoft.com]
GO
--Grant select permission object level 
--REVOKE SELECT ON OBJECT::dbo.sj_view to [pbi1@mngenv544380.onmicrosoft.com]
GRANT SELECT ON OBJECT::dbo.sj_view to [pbi1@mngenv544380.onmicrosoft.com]
-- Grant select permission at schema level 
GRANT SELECT ON SCHEMA::dbo TO [pbi1@mngenv544380.onmicrosoft.com]
GO
--Grant permission at DB level 
ALTER ROLE db_owner ADD MEMBER [pbi1@mngenv544380.onmicrosoft.com]
